source.5a4c5c5c:
diettype = df.diet.value_counts().reset_index()
plt.figure(figsize=(7,7))
plt.pie(diettype.diet, labels = diettype['index'],autopct='%0.2f%%',shadow=True)
plt.title("Vegetarian vs Non-Vegetarian")
plt.show()
